name: Introduction to Educational Psychology
description: An introductory course to the field of Educational Psychology, which includes topics such as learning theories and strategies, cognitive development, and motivation.

name: Educational Psychology in the Classroom
description: This course focuses on the application of Educational Psychology in the classroom, including topics such as classroom management, assessment, and instructional design.

name: Research Methods in Educational Psychology
description: This course focuses on research methods and techniques used in Educational Psychology, including topics such as research designs, data collection, and data analysis.

name: Advanced Educational Psychology
description: This course focuses on the more advanced topics of Educational Psychology, including topics such as program evaluation, innovation, and the impact of educational technology.
